snippet: Eleven days earlier, the Islamist rulers stoned a couple to death, and now calls for a regional intervention force are growing.
abstract: Islamists controlling northern Mali publicly amputate the hand of a man they accused of robbery, continuing an increasingly harsh application of what the vast region's new masters consider sacred law.
lead_paragraph: Eleven days earlier, the Islamist rulers stoned a couple to death, and now calls for a regional intervention force are growing.

headline.seo: Islamists in Northern Mali Amputate Man’s Hand
headline.main: Islamists in North Mali Amputate Man’s Hand
headline.print_headline: Islamists In North Mali Amputate Man’s Hand
